text: Ralph Steingruber (born 15 January 1967) is a retired Swiss football defender.Weltfussball ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Swiss footballers Category:BSC Old Boys players Category:FC Basel players Category:FC St. Gallen players Category:FC Wil 1900 players Category:Association football defenders Category:Swiss Super League players
